title: Oh No Cuomo, TikTok Induced 8.5.21
itunes:title: Oh No Cuomo, TikTok Induced 8.5.21
description:
In episode 965, Miles and guest co-host Caitlin Durante are joined by comedian Teresa Lee to discuss Republicans and muppets, Cuomo's laughable defense, the Olympics, South Africa’s Succulent Black Market, frozen honey, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Do the Republicans love or hate the Muppets 
  2. Cuomo’s defense is laughable yet he thinks it’s effective
  3. Olympics humanitarian crisis
  4. South Africa’s Succulent Black Market is POPPIN OFF
  5. Y’all heard of the Frozen Honey trend?
  6. Listen Jared Jackson - Player's Bop (One For Jay Dee)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
